name: SkyDiver 3D FREE - The Parachute and Skydiving 3D Trainer
name_original: SkyDiver 3D FREE - The Parachute and Skydiving 3D Trainer
description:
In this game you can feel like a real skydiver. You have 10 attemps to come in the right position to hit the target. You have always to hit on the target before falling to the ground and missed the try.

This is a game for the whole family and brings you a lot of fun and entertainment.

Features:
-Easy to learn - control left and right
-10 attempts to get the best results
-Very cute graphics
-Cool ambient sounds
-Save and load automatically your high score

This is the free version with a few ads - You can find the ad free version in the store.
